resources.string: NOTICE: The free API endpoint "Get Recommendations" has been deprecated from public use. Therefore, only the "My Top Songs" option works :(\n\nSpotifly creates playlists based on YOUR listening habits to help YOU discover new music. Pick a genre, playlist name, and let the magic begin! If the generated playlist is not up your alley, give it another try. No two Spotifly playlists are identical!
